channel.title: cakephp on Dieter's blog
channel.description: Recent content in cakephp on Dieter's blog

item.title: CakePHP and a paradigm shift to a code generation based approach?
item.description: At my new job, I'm writing a quite full-featured web application. I've choosen to use CakePHP. Why? Well, it may be 2 years since I last used it, but I've followed the project and it's planet, and it seems to have matured and gained even more monumentum. I want to use something that is widely used so there is plenty of stuff available for it, it's RAD, it's flexible and powerful.
